example.eg: Some people enjoy frequent interaction with others.
example.egtrans: 有些人喜欢与他人频繁交流。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 互动, 交流, 沟通

example.eg: In this interaction, oxygen molecules form two compounds.
example.egtrans: 氧原子在这个相互作用中形成了两种化合物。

example.eg: It is the interaction between human and machine that makes this system so successful.
example.egtrans: 人与机器相互影响，故而这个系统大获成功。

example.eg: Children without siblings often have difficulties with social interaction in school.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 社交活动, 社会交往
